TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IAggregateMethodCallTranslatorProvider
.class public interface auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit IAggregateMethodCallTranslatorProvider

Docs.summary: Provides translations for LINQ expressions which represents aggregate methods.
Docs.remarks: The service lifetime is and multiple registrations are allowed. This means that each instance will use its own set of instances of this service. The implementations may depend on other services registered with any lifetime. The implementations do not need to be thread-safe.

Public Function Translate (model As IModel, method As MethodInfo, source As EnumerableExpression, arguments As IReadOnlyList(Of SqlExpression), logger As IDiagnosticsLogger(Of DbLoggerCategory.Query)) As SqlExpression

Docs.summary: Translates a LINQ aggregate to a SQL equivalent.
